localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Ubacast helps creators host, securely stream videos and get paid through: - video channel donations, - video support donations, - video pay per view. Not all creators can earn a living from Ads on YouTube. Think of Ubacast as a Patreon for video creators.
blogPost.body: Ubacast helps creators host, securely stream videos and get paid through: - video channel donations, - video support donations, - video pay per view. Not all creators can earn a living from Ads on YouTube. Think of Ubacast as a Patreon for video creators.
blogPost.title: Ubacast - Video streaming and monetization. Patreon for video creators
blogPost.author: Sebastien Peterson

localize.description: Ubacast帮助创作者托管、安全流媒体视频，并通过以下方式获得报酬：-视频频道捐赠，-视频支持捐赠，-视频按次付费。不是所有的创作者都能在YouTube上靠广告谋生。把Ubacast看作是视频创作者的Patreon。
localize.tagline: 视频流和货币化。视频创作者的Patreon

localize.description: Ubacast幫助創作者託管、安全流媒體視頻，並通過以下方式獲得報酬：-視頻頻道捐贈，-視頻支持捐贈，-視頻按次付費。不是所有的創作者都能在YouTube上靠廣告謀生。把Ubacast看作是視頻創作者的Patreon。
localize.tagline: 視頻流和貨幣化。視頻創作者的Patreon

previous.excerpt: yatta! is the best way to get aware your audience's habits on Twitter. Find what time of the day your tweets get more attention.
previous.title: yatta! analytics - What is your best time to tweet?

localize.description: yatta！是了解你的受众在Twitter上的习惯的最好方法。找出一天中什么时间你的推文更受关注。
localize.tagline: 你的最佳微博时间是什么时候？

localize.description: yatta！是瞭解你的受衆在Twitter上的習慣的最好方法。找出一天中什麼時間你的推文更受關注。
localize.tagline: 你的最佳微博時間是什麼時候？

next.excerpt: Tailscale is a zero config VPN for building secure networks. Install on any device in minutes. Remote access from any network or physical location. Built on WireGuard®.
next.title: Tailscale - A secure network that just works

localize.description: Tailscale是一个零配置的VPN，用于构建安全网络。在几分钟内安装在任何设备上。从任何网络或物理位置远程访问。建立在WireGuard®上。
localize.tagline: 一个安全的网络，只是工作

localize.description: Tailscale是一個零配置的VPN，用於構建安全網絡。在幾分鐘內安裝在任何設備上。從任何網絡或物理位置遠程訪問。建立在WireGuard®上。
localize.tagline: 一個安全的網絡，只是工作
